type.title: Short title.
type.context: BANKING LAWS ACT under Short title. 1. This Act may be cited as the Banking Laws Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Banking Laws Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Variable interest rate fixed date debentures.
type.context: BANKING LAWS ACT under Variable interest rate fixed date debentures. 2. Notwithstanding the provisions of the General Local Loan Act in so far as they relate to the provisions of this section the Minister or any other person or persons specially authorised by him is hereby authorised to issue variable interest rate fixed date debentures with interest being paid quarterly at rates of interest that will vary without any provision being made for the creation of a sinking fund for redemption thereof.
